content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal extraction area at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)

### Iron gear wheel factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z) and inserter (position a) that puts into assembling machine

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough required items in your inventory before attempting to craft. For example, you need 2 iron plates to craft an iron gear wheel.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
